Heh heh! My buddy the Ninja! Good one Sandy! :)

If you want to look at his=
 character, feel free to go on the wiki page.

I have not had a chance to u=
pdate his change from being under Unicron I
don't think, but other than tha=
t it should be about right. His write up is
at http://www.wikihost.org//w/n=
bwrpg_wiki/nightrazor

You can also click on any of the stuff on the charac=
ter page to see the
write ups for some of the other characters. Even Tuscon=
 is there, based on
the last change we talked about.

http://www.wikihost.o=
rg//w/nbwrpg_wiki/character_list
I hope to be posting next update on Monday=
. It has been a really busy week
for me.


Kraftlos,

The edit function doe=
s not seem to be working, so I cannot make any changes,
and I am logged in.=
 Not sure what's up. I can see that there have been some
changes to the Wik=
ipage as in overall set up, and I am not sure if that has
something to do w=
ith it.

Preston

<p>OOC: I'd say he is, but it's weak. Only to the stren=
gth where he'd be limited to using it for nothing more than echolocatio=
n. Due to his loss of power, I'd say he's not emitting the larger w=
aves, just the weak ones. So this means that your ninja buddy is no longer =
suffering from that, because the wave that's emitted, is so low powered=
 that not even a moth could feel it. Just think of a bat using their echolo=
cation for trapping an insect, and you have the strength of the wave.<br>
<=
br>Hope this helps.
